channel.title: Safe zone
channel.description: Hello , i am working on a new PK Zone But does anyone know how i can change a zone to safe zone ? Thanks.[br][size=1]Posted on: November 01, 2007, 08:38:11 AM[/size][hr]Sorry for bumping but does nobody know this ? :|

item.title: Safe zone
item.dc:creator: @Gazmask Gazmask
item.description:
@Gazmask wrote:

[quote=“cwg452003, post:3, topic:156058”]In client.java search for

public boolean nonWild()

In there add this

(absX >= "maximum x" && absX <= "Minimum x" && absY >= "Maximum y" && absY <= "Minimum y" )

If you do not have that boolean here is is

public boolean nonWild() { if( (absX >= "maximum x" && absX <= "Minimum x" && absY >= "Maximum y" && absY <= "Minimum y" )|| heightLevel == 1) return true; else return false; }
Just change the maximum x and stuff to the coords[/quote]

Thanks Alot

Read full topic

item.title: Safe zone
item.dc:creator: @cwg452003 cwg452003
item.description:
@cwg452003 wrote:

In client.java search for

public boolean nonWild()

In there add this

(absX >= "maximum x" && absX <= "Minimum x" && absY >= "Maximum y" && absY <= "Minimum y" )

If you do not have that boolean here is is

public boolean nonWild() { if( (absX >= "maximum x" && absX <= "Minimum x" && absY >= "Maximum y" && absY <= "Minimum y" )|| heightLevel == 1) return true; else return false; }
Just change the maximum x and stuff to the coords
